page.description: The 'Add Item' button has an option to add a 'Button' to the List Builder's 'Fields' pane. Embedding a button in a list also opens a set of Button Properties.

section.description: Adding a Button control to the fields list on the Fields pane of the List Builder will insert a button into each row of the list. This button can then be tied to a custom Javascript Action. For a video tutorial watch [this video] or read the [transcript].
section.note: For the button to be visible in the list it will need to be added to the Columns in List in the List Layout pane.
